cast.overview: The remarkable story of Brazilian racing driver Ayrton Senna, charting his physical and spiritual achievements on the track and off, his quest for perfection, and the mythical status he has since attained, is the subject of Senna, a documentary feature that spans the racing legend's years as an F1 driver, from his opening season in 1984 to his untimely death a decade later.
cast.title: Senna

details.biography:
Leonardo Senna da Silva is a Brazilian businessman, the younger brother of the driver Ayrton Senna, and founder of the automotive company Audi Senna, which was responsible for importing vehicles from the German manufacturer Audi (a subsidiary of Volkswagen) between 1994 and 2004.

Leonardo conceived the idea for the company, initially named Senna Import, in 1993 when Ayrton was seeking new investments. When asked if living daily with his brother's image as a driver is painful, Leonardo responds that the most challenging work is with the Ayrton Senna Institute, created by his sister, Viviane Senna, which is deeply connected to the champion’s legacy.
details.name: Leonardo Senna
